l. It is objected, That the Apostle contradicts himself: he had just now said that the Colossians were risen; but those who are risen again are alive: now in almost the

This difficulty is solved by distinguishing, They are dead to the world, to sin, and the flesh, as was before shewn3 but they live to God and Christ.
